attributes.action: inforce the no parking in disabled spaces at super-markets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: PARKING WARDENS SHOULD HAVE THE POWER TO GO ON TO SUPERMARKET CARPARKS AND TICKET OFENDING MOTORISTS.SUGGEST TO SHOP TROLLY COLLECTERS TO REPORT OFFENDING CARS AND HAVE THEIR REG.NO.READ OUT OVER THE LOUD SPEAKERS IN STORE.THAT WOULD HOPEFULY SHAME THE OFFENDERS.

rejection.details:
Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
Do you mean to write "enforce" in the title?
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
